00039 bool PairDump::EvaluateFrame(Topology *top) {
00040 
00041     // Rigidify if (a) not rigid yet (b) rigidification at all possible
00042     if (!top->isRigid()) {
00043         bool isRigid = top->Rigidify();
00044         if (!isRigid) { return 0; }
00045     }
00046     else { cout << endl << "... ... System is already rigidified."; }
00047 
00048     FILE *out;
00049 
00050     _outParent = "frame" + boost::lexical_cast<string>(top->getDatabaseId());
00051     mkdir(_outParent.c_str(), 0755);
00052 
00053     vector<Segment*> ::iterator sit;
00054     for (sit = top->Segments().begin(); sit < top->Segments().end(); ++sit) {
00055 
00056         string ID   = boost::lexical_cast<string>((*sit)->getId());
00057         string DIR  = _outParent + "/mol_" + ID;
00058         string FILE = _outParent + "/mol_" + ID + "/mol_" + ID + ".xyz";
00059 
00060         mkdir(DIR.c_str(), 0755);        
00061         out = fopen(FILE.c_str(),"w");
00062         (*sit)->WriteXYZ(out);
00063         fclose(out);
00064     }
00065 
00066     QMNBList ::iterator pit;
00067     QMNBList &nblist = top->NBList();
00068     for (pit = nblist.begin(); pit != nblist.end(); ++pit) {
00069 
00070         string ID1  = boost::lexical_cast<string>((*pit)->Seg1()->getId());
00071         string ID2  = boost::lexical_cast<string>((*pit)->Seg2()->getId());
00072         string DIR1 = _outParent + "/pair_" + ID1 + "_" + ID2;
00073         string DIR2 = DIR1 + "/dim";
00074         string FILE = DIR2 + "/pair_" + ID1 + "_" + ID2 + ".xyz";
00075 
00076         mkdir(DIR1.c_str(), 0755);
00077         mkdir(DIR2.c_str(), 0755);
00078         out = fopen(FILE.c_str(),"w");
00079         (*pit)->WriteXYZ(out);
00080         fclose(out);
00081     }
00082 }
